member.name: DEVICE_DSM_OFFLOAD_WRITE_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Specifies parameters for the offload write operation. An offload write operation is initiated by specifying DeviceDsmAction_OffloadWrite in theAction member of thestructure passed in aIOCTL_STORAGE_MANAGE_DATA_SET_ATTRIBUTEScontrol code.

member.name: DEVICE_DSM_OFFLOAD_WRITE_PARAMETERS.TokenOffset
member.summary: The starting offset to copy from the range bound to the token

member.name: DEVICE_DSM_OFFLOAD_WRITE_PARAMETERS.Token
member.summary: structure containing the token returned from the offload read operation.
